HDG.FS.content: reading Hegel’s “dichotomy (Entzweiung) is the source of the need for philosophy” [Differenz…], Heidegger states that all attempts to suppress “tearing” must be abandoned, “tearing” im Grunde remains and must remain: “in the tearing…there always reigns (waltet) unity or a necessary conjoining (Vereinigung) that is, a living unity”

HDG.EC.content: malice of devastation reaches its extreme in appearance of secure state world, standard of living and its realization as highest goal [reaches its extreme in disguise]

HDG.OHF.content: for faith, man is “fallen,” his being-fallen not derived from God, but state into which man brought himself [explanation of Kant-like co-givenness of man’s goodness & his possibility of falling] > primordial experience of being-sinful (Sündigseins) at particular time: closed context of experience, basis of anthropology of Christian theology > [Nietzsche-like] God-relation (as constitutive) neutralized into consciousness of norms/values, center of acts (archē), “Ego-pole”
